title: How Facebook steals your iPhone’s battery life
text: Steal is a strong word, but that seems to be the case with the Facebook mobile app on iOS when it comes to battery life. The company is looking to maximize the screen time it gets from each user, so it’s apparently reverting to some shady tactics to deliver new content to you. That means refreshing the app in the background on the iPhone 6s and any other iOS device, even though you may have told it not to.
